showReleaseNotes.title: Show Update Notes
showReleaseNotes.desc: This option will show update notes when updated to a new version of OldTwitch.

alertUpdates.title: Alert Me When Out-of-date
alertUpdates.desc: Shows a banner at the top of the page to update OldTwitch. Enabled by default for dev builds.

lang.title: Set Language
lang.desc: Change the language of all of OldTwitch. (Help grow the list--contribute on the GitHub page!)

year.title: Year Theme
year.desc: Change the current theme for OldTwitch. (Currently work in progress!!!)

forceColorMode.title: Force Color Mode
forceColorMode.desc: OldTwitch will force the color mode that is set in the "Force Which Color Mode" option.

forceWhichColorMode.title: Force Which Color Mode
forceWhichColorMode.desc: Will force either light or dark mode on all pages.
